name: dashwise
description: Dashwise Next is a drag-and-drop personal dashboard for displaying stats, widgets, weather, or custom data in a responsive layout. Designed for self-hosting, it helps users build their own control center or homepage.
features: Drag-and-Drop: Build dashboards visually without coding. Intuitive customization.
Widget Library: Stats, weather, custom data, and more. Everything you need.
Responsive Layout: Adapts perfectly to any screen size. Works on all devices.
Personal Homepage: Create your own control center. Centralized information hub.
Custom Data: Display any information you want. Unlimited flexibility.
Self-Hosted: Run your personal dashboard privately. Your data, your design.
